name: Monterey 25,000 BTU Natural Gas Wall Furnace
description: The Williams Furnace Co. Monterey 25,000 BTU Natural Gas Top-Vent Wall Furnace allows you to heat a room without the need for electricity to save you money and keep you warm during power outages. This wall furnace comfortably installs between wall studs and can be converted to run on liquid propane with the use of an optional conversion kit (not included).25,000 BTUs for powerful heatingConverts to propane with the optional conversion kit (not included) so you can choose the fuel type that fits your needsDurable ceramic-coated combustion chamber for increased efficiencyOptional free standing kit (not included) allows the furnace to be mounted on the surface of a wallMatchless pilot igniterResettable vent- limit switchMay be converted to propane gas with the purchase of conversion kit number 8913Attractive, soft-white finishHome Depot Protection Plan:
